DOC.brief_title: Is Adding E2 P4 Luteal Support In High Responder Long Gn-RH Agonist ICSI Cycles Detrimental Outcome ? RCT
DOC.detailed_description: The role estradiol ( E2 ) luteal support still debate decade use . Two recent meet analysis ( Gelbaya et al 2008 ) & ( Jee et al 2010 ) ( ) show addition E2 P4 luteal phase support IVF/ICSI cycle beneficial effect pregnancy rate . However comment data literature , limited heterogeneous , preclude extraction clear definite conclusion . Previous meet analysis ( Pritts Atwood 2002 ) update ( Fatemi et al 2007 ) subsequent randomize trial ( Ghanem et al 2009 , Var et al 2011 ) report beneficial effect add E2 luteal P4 support . Recent retrospective study show high response term excess egg production ( > 15 . ) high E2 ( Chen et al 2007 , Kyrou et al 2009 , Sunkara 2011 ) detrimental cycle outcome . This prospective randomize trial aim study whether add E2 P4 luteal support high ovarian responder detrimental cycle outcome -- -- -- -- -- -- -- - Gelbaya TA , KyrgiouM , Tsoumpou I , Nardo LG . DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion age < 40 year , first ICSI cycle , third day FSH < 10 mIU/mL , serum E2 level day hCG administration < 4,000 pg/mL , number ovum obtain > 15 age 40 year , basal FSH 10 mIU/mL , egg retrieve 15 less , E2 level day hCG administration 4000 pg/ mL , repeat ICSI , need PGD , presence myoma , hydrosalpinx ( unless disconnect )
